articles.description: COLUMBUS (WCMH) — The Ohio Department of Health has released the latest number of COVID-19 cases. As of Tuesday, Aug. 10, a total of 1,145,925 (+2,326) cases has been reported since the start of the pandemic, leading to 62,734 (+159) hospitalizations and 8,55…

articles.author: Sarah Molano, CNN
articles.title: Youth depression and anxiety doubled during the pandemic, new analysis finds - CNN
articles.description: Youth depression and anxiety doubled during the pandemic compared to pre-pandemic levels, a new study found. Levels of mental illness symptoms are higher in older children and in females.
